thread.title: I have been 'killed' several times: Mohanlal
thread.title_full: I have been 'killed' several times: Mohanlal - The Times of India

author: Asha Prakash
title: I have been 'killed' several times: Mohanlal
text:
Mohanlal has lashed out against people who give out fake news, through his blog.
The trigger for the outburst is a false news which has been circulating for a few days, that actor Mamukkoya has died of a kidney related ailment. "I cannot fathom the mind which finds pleasure in creating and spreading such news," he writes, adding that he himself has been killed off often likewise. In one instance, he was shooting in Ootty when it was reported that he had died in a car accident.
"Telephones were few and far in between, and it was only after a long while that I could talk to my parents and assure them that I'm alive and well," he says. "But the amount of pain my parents underwent during that period was immense."
Mohanlal concludes his blog saying that spreading such news should be looked at as a crime, and if possible, the one who created the new originally, should be caught and punished.
